Waikato wheelchair rugby player Georgia Mecchia tackles Outward Bound course with fellow para athletes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-wheelchair-rugby-player-georgia-mecchia-tackles-outward-bound-course-with-fellow-para-athletes/EAEPN2IQ2BDZHHB4MKCGNVUSGQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-wheelchair-rugby-player-georgia-mecchia-tackles-outward-bound-course-with-fellow-para-athletes/EAEPN2IQ2BDZHHB4MKCGNVUSGQ/ The special programme was developed with Paralympics New Zealand and NZ Wheelchair Rugby. ‘Atmospheric river’ could soak South Island with more than a month’s rain in three days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/atmospheric-river-could-soak-south-island-with-more-than-a-months-rain-in-third-days/73HEJ5A3RRHPDDWMXQJCG2KWL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/atmospheric-river-could-soak-south-island-with-more-than-a-months-rain-in-third-days/73HEJ5A3RRHPDDWMXQJCG2KWL4/ Jamie MortonMetService issues a raft of new weather watches and warnings ahead of a big rain-maker.
